content: shop special offer - 4 for 3 on all crochet & knitting patterns click here to see all my patterns just add 4 patterns to your cart before checkout 1 »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» * chunky basketweave baby blanket* knit up this quick and easy pattern for a warm and cosy baby blanket only 64 stitches per row and a simple repeat pattern perfect for an absolute beginner you would need to know how to do the following knitting stitches knit purl finished blanket size 33 x 33 inches 84cm x 84cm chunky basketweave baby blanket knitting pattern is copyrighted to peach unicorn designs but permission is granted for any finished blankets to be sold with the condition that the pattern is credited back to peach unicorn designs 1 http //www ravelry com/stores/peach-unicorn-designs 2 https //peachunicorndesigns com/pages/knitting-videos 3 https //shrsl com/2j2h0
